input.sentences: while at the lake everybody had lunch . the kids ate macaroni .
while the adults ate fish they caught .
the kids put on life jackets before going swimming .
the adults rode in a canoe with some of the kids .
the adults almost flipped the canoe while paddling .
output.sentences: In a quiet scenic picnic, two children hatch a plan of world conquest.
The parents look over unsuspectingly at their seemingly innocent progeny.
Keeping up the appearance of their chronological age, the young pair put their plan into action.
Seated in a water craft with their parental units, the two children begin to enjoy the experience.
Seeing the fear in their victims visage, the two child robots give up their plans and decide to stay kids.
